componentview.yacl.option.boolean.advanc: Show when Advanced Tooltips are on, without needing to press any keybinds
componentview.yacl.option.boolean.identi: If pressing alt or control (option or command on Mac), attempts to translate the component type via identifier. This doesn't really do anything (yet) as components don't have translation keys.
componentview.yacl.option.color.type.des: When pressing shift, the component types appear in this color
componentview.yacl.option.color.value.de: When pressing shift, the component values appear in this color
componentview.yacl.group.list.hiddencomp: Add components by their type here (such as minecraft:rarity) to remove them from the tooltip. Please visit the Minecraft Wiki page on Data Component Format to see a list of vanilla components.
